Name: SmartyTale 2D
About the game: Do you remember these old game pads? The 90s, when you didn't go to sleep, when you tried to find all the hidden Easter eggs and also accomplish the game on a game pad, connected to an old TV? Well, I do! That is exactly, why I present you a game, carefully made in the good old manner. In this game you will have to pass not the simplest levels, beating your foes and collecting valuable objects. All maps have disguised treasures and characters, who you can talk to and understand what is happening in this game. Depending on the amount of energy spent on exploring the areas, you will unlock various endings available in the game. I hope, that a lively gameplay and responsiveness of this game, combined with an extraordinary story, will plunge you into true joy and nostalgic memories about the good old games on game pads for hours. Enjoy!))))
